uk.co.corelogic.npa.checks
[Groovy] Class NagiosCheck

java.lang.Object
  java.util.TimerTask
      Check
          NagiosCheck

class NagiosCheck
extends Check

This class uses ExternalGatherer to run nagios checks directly. These checks must comply with normal nagios guidelines

Authors:
Chris Gilbert
